query.q: owl_individual_of(A, knowrob:'SemanticEnvironmentMap'), rdf_reachable(PART, knowrob:describedInMap, A), rdf_reachable(PART, knowrob:properPhysicalParts, P).
query.text: get all parts and their physical parts of a map

query.q: findall(P, (owl_individual_of(A, knowrob:'SemanticEnvironmentMap'), rdf_reachable(PART, knowrob:describedInMap, A), rdf_reachable(PART, knowrob:properPhysicalParts, P)), L).
query.text: --all solutions of the above at once

query.q:
owl_individual_of(A, knowrob:'SemanticEnvironmentMap'),

findall(L,
  (rdf_reachable(PART, knowrob:describedInMap, A),
    findall(P, (rdf_reachable(PART, knowrob:properPhysicalParts, P)), L)
  ),
  LL
).
query.text: get a nested list LL with all kitchen parts and their subparts

query.q:
owl_individual_of(A, knowrob:'SemanticEnvironmentMap'),

findall(
  N,
  (rdf_reachable(PART, knowrob:describedInMap, A),
    findall(P, (rdf_reachable(PART, knowrob:properPhysicalParts, P)), L),
    length(L, N)
  ),
  VALUES
),

findall(PART, (rdf_reachable(PART, knowrob:describedInMap, A)), LABELS),

add_diagram(id, 'subparts of kitchen parts', barchart, xlabel, ylabel, '500', '500', '12px', [[LABELS,VALUES]]).
query.text: show subpart distribution of kitchen parts in diagram

query.q:
Labels = ['ManipulationPoseUnreachable', 'ObjectNotFound', 'ManipulationFailed', 'LocationNotReached', 'ObjectLost', 'ManipulationPoseOccupied'],findall(N, (
member(Error, Labels),
    findall(E, (failure_class(E, C), string_concat('http://ias.cs.tum.edu/kb/knowrob.owl#', Error, C)), List), length(List, N)
  ),
Occurence),
add_diagram(iderror, 'error distribution', barchart, xlabel, ylabel, '210', '210', '12px', [[Labels,Occurence]]).
query.text: Show occurences of typical error types in bar or donut chart - new file format!

query.q:
Labels = ['MANIPULATION-POSE-UNREACHABLE', 'OBJECT-NOT-FOUND', 'MANIPULATION-FAILED', 'LOCATION-NOT-REACHED', 'OBJECT-LOST', 'MANIPULATION-POSE-OCCUPIED'],
findall(N,
  (
    member(Error, Labels),
    findall([E,B], (failure_task(E, C), failure_attribute(E, rdfs:'label', X), [X]=[literal(type(A,B))], B=Error), List), length(List, N)
  ),
Occurence),
add_diagram(iderror, 'error distribution', barchart, xlabel, ylabel, '210', '210', '12px', [[Labels,Occurence]]).
query.text: Show occurences of typical error types in bar or donut chart

query.q: Labels = ['Failed Instances', 'Successful Instances'], bagof(Err, (task_class(Task, knowrob:'PerformOnProcessModule'),  failure_task(Err, Task)), Errors), length(Errors, NumErr), bagof(Task, task_class(Task, knowrob:'PerformOnProcessModule'), Tasks), length(Tasks, NumT), NumSuccess is NumT- NumErr, add_diagram(iderror, 'error distribution', barchart, xlabel, ylabel, '210', '210', '12px', [[Labels,[NumErr, NumSuccess]]]).
query.text: Show occurences of errors in a certain task type bar or donut chart

query.q: aggregate_all(sum(D) / count, (task(T), task_class(T, knowrob:'UIMAPerception'), duration_of_a_task(T,D)), D1).
query.text: How long did a task of a certain type take on average?

query.q: findall(FailClass,(task_class(T, knowrob:'UIMAPerception'), failure_task(F, T), failure_class(F, FailClass)), FailReasons).
query.text: Which were common problems for a certain task type?
Show trajectories for given tf-link between two timepoints
Which actions is a task composed of?
Which motions are part of the task?
Can perception tasks be done by Raphael?
Where was the robat localized at a certain time?
Where was an object located at a certain time?
